status_updates.description:
‚ö°Ô∏è A boost for Uppsala Security‚Äôs product suite has just been released! We are excited to share that the Crypto Analysis Transaction Visualization (CATV) & Crypto Analysis Risk Assessment (CARA) tools now support the Klaytn Network ($KLAY)! 

üõ° The current integration is opening Klaytn‚Äôs user base the access to crowdsourced threat intelligence, decreased transaction risk and increased tracking capabilities: https://bit.ly/3k6qvnj

üîä Calling our Japanese audience!

üáØüáµ ICYMI: We are constantly growing our Japanese content with articles covering AML solutions, product updates, regulatory compliance, hacking investigations and more.

‚ö°Ô∏è Stay up to date by following us on Medium: https://medium.com/sentinel-protocol/tagged/japan

‚ö°Ô∏è Details about the Liquid Exchange Hacking incident keep emerging!

üîç For investigating the Liquid Exchange Hacking incident, we utilized our products called Crypto Analysis Transaction Visualization (CATV) and our new product (soon to be released) called Crypto Asset Monitor Service¬†(CAMS); for more information, please refer to the following link: https://bit.ly/3zvaVqR

üåç Transaction tracking for crypto crime victims is a problem of yesterday. Starting today, the Digital Asset Tracking Service is available worldwide!

üëâ Get help from the world's top experts: https://medium.com/sentinel-protocol/uppsala-securitys-digital-asset-tracking-service-the-go-to-solution-for-victims-of-2f3538ff8998

üéâ We are excited to announce that Uppsala Security has been selected as the ‚ÄúBest Crowdsourced Threat Intelligence Platform‚Äú within the FinTech Awards 2021! 

üëâ The Awards program was organized by the UK based Wealth & Finance Magazine which this year celebrates its fifth anniversary of recognizing the companies and projects that are reshaping the finance and banking for the modern age.

üîç More details can be found here: https://bit.ly/37xCAeG

üîç Investigation mode ON!

‚ö°Ô∏è We just released one of the most thorough investigations yet conducted by Uppsala Security‚Äôs SecOps Team!

üëâ Fake iShares Crypto Exchange Campaign: $4.1M USD worth of lost digital assets, more than 13 exchanges targeted and over 175 user wallets¬†involved. 

üî• Read the full article here: https://bit.ly/3CEHjJZ

‚ö°Ô∏è You can now vote for Uppsala Security at the WorldFestival 2021 Innovation Awards: https://zpr.io/7yxnZdtaSEcT

üéâ Uppsala Security is excited to be nominated for a WorldFestival 2021 Innovation Award within the Blockchain & Cryptocurrency category, and we need our community‚Äôs support¬†to secure a spot as a Top 50 Startup! 

üåç By registering your¬†vote¬†you can also get a free WORLD Pass to join us digitally at¬†WorldFestival 2021¬†(Aug 17-19).
